columns.name: queue_url
columns.description: The URL of the Amazon SQS queue.

columns.name: queue_arn
columns.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the queue.

columns.name: fifo_queue
columns.description: Returns true if the queue is FIFO.

columns.name: fifo_throughput_limit
columns.description: Specifies whether the FIFO queue throughput quota applies to the entire queue or per message group.

columns.name: delay_seconds
columns.description: The default delay on the queue in seconds.

columns.name: max_message_size
columns.description: The limit of how many bytes a message can contain before Amazon SQS rejects it.

columns.name: message_retention_seconds
columns.description: The length of time, in seconds, for which Amazon SQS retains a message.

columns.name: receive_wait_time_seconds
columns.description: The length of time, in seconds, for which the ReceiveMessage action waits for a message to arrive.

columns.name: sqs_managed_sse_enabled
columns.description: Returns true if the queue is using SSE-SQS encryption with SQS-owned encryption keys.

columns.name: visibility_timeout_seconds
columns.description: The visibility timeout for the queue in seconds.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The resource IAM policy of the queue.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: redrive_policy
columns.description: The string that includes the parameters for the dead-letter queue functionality of the source queue as a JSON object.

columns.name: content_based_deduplication
columns.description: Mentions whether content-based deduplication is enabled for the queue.

columns.name: deduplication_scope
columns.description: Specifies whether message deduplication occurs at the message group or queue level.

columns.name: kms_master_key_id
columns.description: the ID of an AWS-managed customer master key (CMK) for Amazon SQS or a custom CMK.
